channel.title: miljko tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from miljko.

item.description: @ManniMD1 @oncology_bg @AaronGoodman33 @VPrasadMDMPH Interesting. The Wesson review (https://t.co/8hPhONLCrN) doesn't note the type of non-randomized trials that increased from 2015 to 2020, so hard to see why their explanation of decreased randomization should be accepted over something less nefarious, like more drugs being tested

Sve sam skoro bodove imao, poljoprivrednu školu… legalizovao objekte, godine… Sve sam imao, jednostavno… sklonili su me, nisam prošao -Zašto? Mislim zato što nisam bio u stranci… Ne znam, sve je to… zna se to unapred ko će da prođe. -Hoćeš ponovo konkurisati? Ne, nikad više. https://t.co/bZgFdh2wQe
